caption.p: RVFV VLP-induced responses in CD4 + and CD8a + T lymphocytes. (A) IL-4 levels in CD4 + T cells determined by intracellular cytokine staining (ICS). (B) IFN-γ levels in CD4 + T cells determined by ICS. (C) IL-4 levels in CD8 + T cells determined by ICS, and (D) IFN-γ levels in CD9 + T cells determined by ICS (* p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01).
